'''''A Hobbit's Journal''''' is a book with blank pages decorated by illustrations depicting various scenes (of mostly characters) from ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', intended to be used as a note-book. It also contains a one-page introductory text.

== See also ==

*''[[A Hobbit's Travels]]''
*''[[A Tolkien Journal]]''
*''[[A Walk Through the Shire]]''
